
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(OpenExifJpeg .)

SET(SOURCES OpenExifJpeg/OpenExif_jcapimin.cpp  OpenExifJpeg/OpenExif_jdapimin.cpp  OpenExifJpeg/OpenExif_jdsample.cpp
